name: OUSIA
description:
OUSIA is a challenging and innovative puzzle-platformer game developed by Parallel Resistance. Escape from a massive matrix of cells by assembling structures and bending the known laws of physics to your will to accomplish your goals. Battle against traps, enemies, and the descent into madness as you try to escape from the labyrinth.

Features:

  • 8 Levels
  • Gravity Mode: Change the direction of gravity and challenge yourself with difficult stunt jumps
  • Tile Mode: Assemble structures of platforms and tunnels to navigate the level
